Other Information.Additional Info: Partially saturates penta-coordinated Co atoms under temperature or pressure stimuli.

Other Information.Threshold Pressure: 0.3 GPa for initial coordination; 2.2 GPa for full saturation
Other Information.Additional Info: Smaller size allows complete saturation of Co centers at higher pressures.
Presence inferred but not directly located in diffraction studies; variable content.
Absorbed when methanol is absent; structural characterization incomplete.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion and chemical reactivity based on guest molecule dimensions and coordination ability

Experimental Validation.Method: Single crystal X-ray diffraction, Powder X-ray diffraction, Thermal analysis
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Reversible coordination of guests observed; structural transitions characterized by changes in symmetry and unit cell volume.

Other Information.Additional Info: Framework exhibits flexibility and selective chemisorption behavior depending on guest size and external stimuli (temperature or pressure).
